aws::graph::propositions: Supplemental Indenture Details for Amazon.com, Inc. Notes
Amazon.com, Inc. executed a Supplemental Indenture dated April 13, 2022.
The Supplemental Indenture was among Amazon.com, Inc., Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, and Computershare Trust Company, National Association.
Wells Fargo Bank, National Association served as the prior trustee in the Supplemental Indenture.
Computershare Trust Company, National Association served as the successor trustee in the Supplemental Indenture.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 2.730% Note due 2024.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 3.000% Note due 2025.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 3.300% Note due 2027.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 3.450% Note due 2029.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 3.600% Note due 2032.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 3.950% Note due 2052.
The Supplemental Indenture contained Form of 4.100% Note due 2062.
The Supplemental Indenture was incorporated by reference to Amazon.com, Inc.'s Current Report on Form 8-K.
Amazon.com, Inc.'s Current Report on Form 8-K was filed on April 13, 2022.

text:
|
| 4.2            | Supplemental Indenture, dated as of April 13, 2022, among Amazon.com, Inc., Wells Fargo Bank, National Association, as prior trustee, and Computershare Trust Company, National Association, as successor trustee, containing Form of 2.730% Note due 2024, Form of 3.000% Note due 2025, Form of 3.300% Note due 2027, Form of 3.450% Note due 2029, Form of 3.600% Note due 2032, Form of 3.950% Note due 2052, and Form of 4.100% Note due 2062 (incorporated by reference to the Companys Current Report on Form 8-K, filed April 13, 2022).
